description: This file defines a CartProvider class that manages the shopping cart state for a Flutter app. It supports adding/removing items, computing totals, and notifying listeners about state changes.

classes.name: CartProvider
classes.description: ChangeNotifier subclass managing cart items and totals.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a MenuItemModel to the cart, increasing quantity if it already exists.

methods.name: removeOne
methods.description: Removes a single quantity of an item, removing the item if quantity drops to zero.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an item entirely from the cart.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.
